paper_abstract: This article is a background report describing a comprehensive study of research in the three computing disciplines Computer Science, Software Engineering, and Information Systems. Findings relate to research topics, approaches, methods, reference disciplines, and levels of analysis. The article informally describes the process used and the research products produced. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: RESRES: The story behind the paper "Research in software engineering: An analysis of the literature"
